sentences.en: But in times like these, they resonate a bit more powerfully.
sentences.cn: 但这样的年代, 他们共鸣更有力.

sentences.en: Do certain words resonate better than others do?
sentences.cn: 某些词语是否比其他要好?

sentences.en: How does that resonate, to redress?
sentences.cn: 这如何怎样引起共鸣, 去纠正?

sentences.en: I resonate greatly with the views of Schopenhauer, Voltaire, Nietzsche, Freud.
sentences.cn: 我非常认同叔本华 、 伏尔泰 、 尼采 、 弗洛伊德的观点.

sentences.en: If the note of D is sounded on a harp, all the corresponding D strings of other octaves will likewise resonate.
sentences.cn: 如果用竖琴演奏D音符，其他八度音阶所有相应的D弦都将发出共鸣。

sentences.en: It is different from other travel guide books, I resonate from the heart.
sentences.cn: 它不同于其它介绍旅游的书, 让我从心底里产生共鸣.

sentences.en: May this song resonate in your heart throughout the holidays!
sentences.cn: 最后让我送您一首诗歌,是我非常爱听的,愿它在节日里回荡在您心中.

sentences.en: Note: Close wound coils will resonate at a slightly lower frequency.
sentences.cn: 注: 密绕的线圈将会谐振在稍低的频率.

sentences.en: Note: Close woundcoils will resonate at a slightly lower frequency.
sentences.cn: (注: 密绕的线圈将会谐振在稍低的频率. )

sentences.en: The bass guitar began to thump so loudly that it resonated in my head.
sentences.cn: 低音吉他开始砰然作响，震得我的脑袋嗡嗡的。

sentences.en: The glyphs of the 20 days resonate with a particular animal or bird as well.
sentences.cn: 表示20天的象形文字与一些特别的动物或者鸟类产生共鸣.

sentences.en: The other circuit is designed to resonate close to the desired frequency.
sentences.cn: 把另一线圈设计成在所有要求的频率范围内可与之谐振.

sentences.en: The rings resonate at more than one frequency each.
sentences.cn: 这些环状物各自有不同的振动频率.

sentences.en: The sound waves from this propagates and makes forks nearby resonate with the same energy.
sentences.cn: 这个声音波来自这个音叉传递并且让音叉靠近这个共振使用相同能量.

sentences.en: These voices become collective and resonate in a global dimension.
sentences.cn: 这些声音汇集起来,将成为一种集体发生,在全球范围内获得共鸣.

sentences.en: This story also attracted a lot of loving attention and resonate with the public.
sentences.cn: 这则报道也引起了许多爱心市民的关注与共鸣.

words.tran_cn: [声] 共鸣器，共鸣体；共振器
产生共鸣；回响（resonate 的ing形式）

trans.tran_en: if something such as an event or a message resonates, it seems important or good to people, or continues to do this
